voltage.docs:
The voltage value of the sensor in Volts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

current.docs:
The current value of the sensor in Amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

power.docs:
The (active) power value of the sensor in Watts. Note that some power meters will report this in negative values (probably wired backwards), so you may want to use a filter to multiply it by -1. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

energy.docs:
Use the energy value of the sensor in kWh. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

frequency.docs:
The frequency value of the sensor in Hertz. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

line_frequency.docs:
**string**: The nominal AC line frequency of the supply voltage. One of `50Hz`, `60Hz`. Defaults to `50Hz`.

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The address of the BL0942 from its strapping pins. Defaults to `0`.

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

reset.docs:
**boolean**: Whether to reset the BL0942 chip on startup, resetting all internal counters. Defaults to `true`.

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

current_reference.docs:
**float**: The calibration parameter for current readings. Defaults to `251213.46469622`.

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

energy_reference.docs:
**float**: The calibration parameter for cumulative energy readings. Defaults to `3304.61127328` unless any of `current_reference`, `voltage_reference` or `power_reference` are explicitly set, in which case it is calculated. See [Calibration](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#bl0942-calibration) for more details.

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

power_reference.docs:
**float**: The calibration parameter for power readings. Defaults to `596.0` unless either `current_reference` or `voltage_reference` are explicitly set, in which case it is calculated. See [Calibration](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#bl0942-calibration) for more details.

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

voltage_reference.docs:
**float**: The calibration parameter for voltage readings. Defaults to `15873.35944299`.

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) if you want to use multiple UART buses.

*See also: [Belling BL0942 Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0942.html#configuration-variables)*
